publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-332 Tommy Sheridan: Objective 2 Funding—That the Parliament regrets the Scottish Executive’s refusal to make available to MSPs, the press and the public the bid document to the European Commission for Objective 2 Funding; notes that every region of England has been provided with such a document, regrets that the nation of Scotland has been denied this, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to provide this document and include the rank ordering of all wards in Scotland which meet the European Union criteria for Objective 2 funding.
S1M-332 Objective 2 Funding (lodged on 26 November 1999) Roseanna Cunningham*, Linda Fabiani*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-332 Objective 2 Funding (lodged on 26 November 1999) Kay Ullrich*
S1M-332 Objective 2 Funding (lodged on 26 November 1999) Mr Jamie McGrigor*

S1M-332 Tommy Sheridan: Objective 2 Funding—That the Parliament regrets the Scottish Executive’s refusal to make available to MSPs, the press and the public the bid document to the European Commission for Objective 2 Funding; notes that every region of England has been provided with such a document; regrets that the nation of Scotland has been denied this, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to provide this document and include the rank ordering of all wards in Scotland which meet the European Union criteria for Objective 2 funding. Supported by: Roseanna Cunningham, Linda Fabiani, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Kay Ullrich, Mr Jamie McGrigor
S1M-332 Objective 2 Funding (lodged on 26 November 1999) Ben Wallace*
S1M-332 Objective 2 Funding (lodged on 26 November 1999) Christine Grahame*
S1M-332 Objective 2 Funding (lodged on 26 November 1999) Mr David Davidson*

S1M-332 Tommy Sheridan: Objective 2 Funding—That the Parliament regrets the Scottish Executive’s refusal to make available to MSPs, the press and the public the bid document to the European Commission for Objective 2 Funding; notes that every region of England has been provided with such a document; regrets that the nation of Scotland has been denied this, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to provide this document and include the rank ordering of all wards in Scotland which meet the European Union criteria for Objective 2 funding. Supported by: Roseanna Cunningham, Linda Fabiani, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Kay Ullrich, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Ben Wallace, Christine Grahame, Mr David Davidson
S1M-332 Objective 2 Funding (lodged on 26 November 1999) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Shona Robison*, Andrew Wilson*
S1M-332 Objective 2 Funding (lodged on 26 November 1999) Michael Matheson*
S1M-332 Objective 2 Funding (lodged on 26 November 1999) Alex Neil*
S1M-332 Objective 2 Funding (lodged on 26 November 1999) Donald Gorrie*

S1M-332 Tommy Sheridan: Objective 2 Funding—That the Parliament regrets the Scottish Executive’s refusal to make available to MSPs, the press and the public the bid document to the European Commission for Objective 2 Funding; notes that every region of England has been provided with such a document; regrets that the nation of Scotland has been denied this, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to provide this document and include the rank ordering of all wards in Scotland which meet the European Union criteria for Objective 2 funding. Supported by: Roseanna Cunningham, Linda Fabiani, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Kay Ullrich, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Ben Wallace, Christine Grahame, Mr David Davidson, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Shona Robison, Andrew Wilson, Michael Matheson, Alex Neil, Donald Gorrie
S1M-332 Objective 2 Funding (lodged on 26 November 1999) David Mundell*, Nick Johnston*

S1M-332 Tommy Sheridan: Objective 2 Funding—That the Parliament regrets the Scottish Executive’s refusal to make available to MSPs, the press and the public the bid document to the European Commission for Objective 2 Funding; notes that every region of England has been provided with such a document; regrets that the nation of Scotland has been denied this, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to provide this document and include the rank ordering of all wards in Scotland which meet the European Union criteria for Objective 2 funding. Supported by: Roseanna Cunningham, Linda Fabiani, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Kay Ullrich, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Ben Wallace, Christine Grahame, Mr David Davidson, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Shona Robison, Andrew Wilson, Michael Matheson, Alex Neil, Donald Gorrie, David Mundell, Nick Johnston
S1M-332 Objective 2 Funding (lodged on 26 November 1999) Robin Harper*
S1M-332 Objective 2 Funding (lodged on 26 November 1999) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Michael Russell*

S1M-332 Tommy Sheridan: Objective 2 Funding—That the Parliament regrets the Scottish Executive’s refusal to make available to MSPs, the press and the public the bid document to the European Commission for Objective 2 Funding; notes that every region of England has been provided with such a document; regrets that the nation of Scotland has been denied this, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to provide this document and include the rank ordering of all wards in Scotland which meet the European Union criteria for Objective 2 funding.
